Class AttestationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.accesscertifier.AttestationAction

extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'TargetAction' entities through Drools rules engine

    • Method Detail

      • findAttestation

        public static <any> findAttestation(DAO sql,
                                    AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the attestations according to the attestation filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - attestation filter
        Returns:
        list of attestations found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertAttestation

        public static AttestationBean insertAttestation(DAO sql,
                                                <any> userBlackList,
                                                <any> attestationProperties,
                                                AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                                <any> attestationSupervisor)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The method inserts the attestation given. It is possible to provide a list of users that will not be reviewers of the attestation. Each attestation has a set of properties that are initialized by default, but it is possible to provide a list of attestation properties to override these default values. The properties not included into the list remain set on default values. To understand which are the possible properties to set, it is recommended to see the AttestationPropUtil static parameters.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBlackList - list of users that will not be reviewers of the attestation, if used, each user must be defined uniquely
        attestationProperties - list of attestation properties to set on the attestation, properties not included into the list are set on default values
        attestationBean - attestation to insert, mandatory
        Returns:
        attestationBean inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateAttestation

        public static AttestationBean updateAttestation(DAO sql,
                                                <any> userBlackList,
                                                <any> attestationProperties,
                                                AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                                <any> attestationSupervisor)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        The method updates the attestation given. It is possible to provide a list of users that will not be reviewers of the attestation. It is possible to provide a list of attestation properties to update the properties. The properties not included into the list remain set on the actual values. To understand which are the possible properties to set, it is recommended to see the AttestationPropUtil static parameters.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userBlackList - list of users that will not be reviewers of the attestation, if used, each user must be defined uniquely
        attestationProperties - list of attestation properties to set on the attestation, properties not included into the list remain set on default values
        attestationBean - attestation to update, mandatory and definde uniquely
        Returns:
        attestationBean updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteAttestation

        public static void deleteAttestation(DAO sql,
                                     AttestationBean attestationBean)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        The method deletes the attestation given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - attestation to delete
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • cloneAttestation

        public static void cloneAttestation(DAO sql,
                                    java.lang.String clonedAttestationName,
                                    AttestationBean attestationBean)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method clones the attestation given. The String clonedAttestationName will be the name of the new cloned attestation. If it is NULL or empty, the name will be generated automatically.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        clonedAttestationName - name of the new cloned attestation
        attestationBean - attestation to clone, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAttestationProp

        public static <any> findAttestationProp(DAO sql,
                                        AttestationBean attestationBean)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the valorized attestation properties of the attestation given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        list of valorized attestation properties found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAttestationPropHM

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,AttestationPropBean> findAttestationPropHM(DAO sql,
                                                                                            AttestationBean attestationBean)
                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns, for the given attestation, a map containing the name of the properties as keyset and the valorized attestation properties as valueset.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        map
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAttestationBlackList

        public static <any> findAttestationBlackList(DAO sql,
                                             AttestationBean attestationBean)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have been manually excluded for being reviewer of the attestation given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        list of users that are not allowed to review the attestation given
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAttestationByUserVisibility

        public static <any> findAttestationByUserVisibility(DAO sql,
                                                    int attestationType,
                                                    UserBean userBean,
                                                    AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                                    Paging paging)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the attestations that the user given has in visibility. It is possible to filter by attestation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationType - attestation type filter, allowed values are: 0- OU-Entitlement, 1- User-Entitlement, 3- User-Remediation
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of attestations that the user has in visibility
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAttestationByUserVisibility

        public static <any> findAttestationByUserVisibility(DAO sql,
                                                    int reviewerOrSupervisor,
                                                    java.lang.Integer attestationType,
                                                    UserBean userBean,
                                                    AttestationBean attestationBean)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the attestations that the user given has in visibility. It is possible to filter by attestation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        attestationType - attestation type filter, allowed values are: NULL- all tipologies, 0- OU-Entitlement, 1- User-Entitlement, 2- Entitlement, 3-User-Remediation
        reviewerOrSupervisor - integer parameter used to specify if the user is seen as: 0- reviewer, 1- supervisor
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter
        Returns:
        list of attestations that the user has in visibility
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
